summary: net/sched: sch_taprio: do not schedule in taprio_reset()
details:
net/sched: sch_taprio: do not schedule in taprio_reset()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.166 by commit cf9a2ce0383e2cb182d223d2ece17f964432367e, it was introduced in version v5.10.166 by commit c60fe70078d6e515f424cb868d07e00411b27fbc. For more details please see the references link.
